com.mumfrey.liteloader.launch

Interface LoaderEnvironment

  • All Superinterfaces:
    GameEnvironment

    public interface LoaderEnvironment
extends GameEnvironment
    The Loader Environment, contains accessors for getting information about the current Loader session such as the game directories, profile, and API management classes. Launch namespace, so loaded by the AppClassLoader
    Author:
    Adam Mummery-Smith

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  LoaderEnvironment.EnvironmentType

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addCascadedTweaker(java.lang.String tweakClass, int priority) 
      APIAdapter getAPIAdapter()
      Get the API Adapter, the API Adapter provides functionality for working with all loaded APIs.
      APIProvider getAPIProvider()
      Get the API Provider, the API Provider contains API instances for the current session.
      java.io.File getCommonConfigFolder()
      Get the version-agnostic mod config folder
      java.io.File getConfigBaseFolder()
      Get the configuration base folder
      EnabledModsList getEnabledModsList()
      The enabled mods list is a serialisable class which contains information about which mods are enabled/disabled.
      LoaderEnumerator getEnumerator()
      The enumerator manages mod container and class discovery
      Repository getModRepository()
      The mod repository defined by command-line option which specifies a JSON file defining a mod repository
